Song.title: Jesus, I Come
Song.copyright: Words by William Sleeper and music by Greg Thompson © 2000 Greg Thompson Used by permission. All rights reserved. CCLI #34312

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [C]Out of my b[G]ondage, [Fmaj7]sorrow and night [Am]Jesus, I [G]come; [Fmaj7]Jesus I come [C]Into Thy [G]freedom, [Fmaj7]gladness and light [Am]Jesus, I [G/B]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [ F G] [Am]Out of my s[G]ickness [Fmaj7]into Thy health [Am]Out of my w[G]anting and [Fmaj7]into Thy wealth [Am]Out of my [G]sin and [Fmaj7]into Thyself [Am]Jesus, I [G]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [Am G Fmaj7]
VERSE 2: [C]Out of my sh[G]ameful [Fmaj7]failure and loss [Am]Jesus, I [G]come; [Fmaj7]Jesus, I come [C]Into the gl[G]orious [Fmaj7]gain of Thy cross [Am]Jesus, I [G/B]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [F G] [Am]Out of earth’s s[G]orrows [Fmaj7]into Thy balm [Am]Out of life’s st[G]orms and [Fmaj7]into Thy calm [Am]Out of distr[G]ess into [Fmaj7]jubilant psalm [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome to [Fmaj7]Thee [Am G Fmaj7]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [C]Out of unr[G]est and [Fmaj7]arrogant pride [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome; [Fmaj7]Jesus, I come [C]Into Thy bl[G]essed [Fmaj7]will to abide [Am]Jesus, I [G/B]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [F G] [Am]Out of mys[G]elf to [Fmaj7]dwell in Thy love [Am]Out of desp[G]air into [Fmaj7]raptures above [Am]Upward for[G]ever on [Fmaj7]wings like a dove [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome to [Fmaj7]Thee [Am G Dsus D]
VERSE 4: [D]Out of the f[A]ear and [Gmaj7]dread of the tomb [Bm]Jesus, I c[A]ome; [Gmaj7]Jesus, I come [D]Into the [A]joy and [Gmaj7]light of Thy home [Bm]Jesus, I [A/C#]come to [Gmaj7]Thee [G A] [Bm]Out of the d[A]epths of [Gmaj7]ruin untold [Bm]Into the p[A]eace of Thy sh[Gmaj7]eltering fold [Bm]Ever Thy gl[A]orious [Gmaj7]face to behold [Bm]Jesus, I c[A]ome to [Gmaj7]Thee [Bm A Gmaj7]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 out of my bondage sorrow and night jesus i come jesus i come into thy freedom gladness and light jesus i come to thee out of my sickness into thy health out of my wanting and into thy wealth out of my sin and into thyself jesus i come to thee verse 2 out of my shameful failure and loss jesus i come jesus i come into the glorious gain of thy cross jesus i come to thee out of earths sorrows into thy balm out of lifes storms and into thy calm out of distress into jubilant psalm jesus i come to thee verse 3 out of unrest and arrogant pride jesus i come jesus i come into thy blessed will to abide jesus i come to thee out of myself to dwell in thy love out of despair into raptures above upward forever on wings like a dove jesus i come to thee verse 4 out of the fear and dread of the tomb jesus i come jesus i come into the joy and light of thy home jesus i come to thee out of the depths of ruin untold into the peace of thy sheltering fold ever thy glorious face to behold jesus i come to thee

VERSE 1: [C]Out of my b[G]ondage, [Fmaj7]sorrow and night [Am]Jesus, I [G]come; [Fmaj7]Jesus I come [C]Into Thy [G]freedom, [Fmaj7]gladness and light [Am]Jesus, I [G/B]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [ F G] [Am]Out of my s[G]ickness [Fmaj7]into Thy health [Am]Out of my w[G]anting and [Fmaj7]into Thy wealth [Am]Out of my [G]sin and [Fmaj7]into Thyself [Am]Jesus, I [G]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [Am G Fmaj7]
VERSE 2: [C]Out of my sh[G]ameful [Fmaj7]failure and loss [Am]Jesus, I [G]come; [Fmaj7]Jesus, I come [C]Into the gl[G]orious [Fmaj7]gain of Thy cross [Am]Jesus, I [G/B]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [F G] [Am]Out of earth’s s[G]orrows [Fmaj7]into Thy balm [Am]Out of life’s st[G]orms and [Fmaj7]into Thy calm [Am]Out of distr[G]ess into [Fmaj7]jubilant psalm [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome to [Fmaj7]Thee [Am G Fmaj7]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [C]Out of unr[G]est and [Fmaj7]arrogant pride [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome; [Fmaj7]Jesus, I come [C]Into Thy bl[G]essed [Fmaj7]will to abide [Am]Jesus, I [G/B]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [F G] [Am]Out of mys[G]elf to [Fmaj7]dwell in Thy love [Am]Out of desp[G]air into [Fmaj7]raptures above [Am]Upward for[G]ever on [Fmaj7]wings like a dove [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome to [Fmaj7]Thee [Am G Dsus D]
VERSE 4: [C]Out of the f[G]ear and [Fmaj7]dread of the tomb [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome; [Fmaj7]Jesus, I come [C]Into the [G]joy and [Fmaj7]light of Thy home [Am]Jesus, I [G/B]come to [Fmaj7]Thee [F G] [Am]Out of the d[G]epths of [Fmaj7]ruin untold [Am]Into the p[G]eace of Thy sh[Fmaj7]eltering fold [Am]Ever Thy gl[G]orious [Fmaj7]face to behold [Am]Jesus, I c[G]ome to [Fmaj7]Thee [Am G Fmaj7]
